application.doc: Initialize QR Code Login Authentication Policy

param.name: runtime_hostname
param.doc: Host name of the runtime interface the appliance listens on

param.name: PolicyId
param.doc: The authentication policy URI

method.name: POST
method.doc: The QR Code Authenticator mechanism can be configured before the policy workflow responds to any runtime requests. Information about its configuration is available under the Configuring Authentication topics of the IBM Knowledge Center.

The requester's first request will initialize the policy workflow and mechanisms for subsequent authentication verification requests. This is achieved by sending a POST request to the authentication service API endpoint specifying the required authentication Policy. The policy identifier for Mobile Multi Factor Fingerprint is 'urn:ibm:security:authentication:asf:qrcode_initiate'.

request.doc:
Initialize the QR Code Login authentication policy:
POST https://{runtime_hostname}/mga/sps/apiauthsvc/policy/qrcode_initiate
The requester must maintain cookies returned by this API and send them on subsequent requests such as PUT requests to verify credentials
